messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of [REDACTED] have stampeded into the maintenance tunnels.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Space Station 13. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, not more than 15 energy draining parasites have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Head of Security's Desk
messages.body: All personell, if you can shoot straight and hate xenos get to the armory

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we have sent a special operative to deal with your situation
